description: This table contains claims information from claim information (CLM) records for Hospital and Professional Billing.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Claim Info record.

columns.name: STER_ABORTION_CD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the sterilization/abortion code to print on the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: SVC_AUTH_EXCEPT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the service authorization exception code detailing why a claim was exempt from the normal authorization process.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Immediate/Urgent Care


Services Rendered in a Retroactive Period


Emergency Care


Client has Temporary Medicaid


Request from County for Second Opinion to Determine if Recipient Can Work


Request for Override Pending


Special Handling

columns.name: AMBULANCE_LICENSE_PLATE_NUMBER
columns.description: The license plate number of the ambulance used for transport

columns.name: AMBULANCE_PICK_UP_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The pick-up time of the ambulance ride

columns.name: AMBULANCE_DROP_OFF_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The drop-off time of the ambulance ride

columns.name: AMBULANCE_ROUNDTRIP_REASON
columns.description: The reason for roundtrip for the ambulance ride

columns.name: AMBU_STRETCHER_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for stretcher for the ambulance ride


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: AMBULANCE_SQUAD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The ambulance squad of the ambulance that the patient rode in


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: AMBULANCE_RUN_NUMBER
columns.description: The run number of the ambulance ride that transported the patient

columns.name: AMBULANCE_VEHICLE_NUMBER
columns.description: The vehicle number for the ambulance that transported the patient

columns.name: AMBULANCE_DISPATCH_DX_ID
columns.description: The dispatch nature for the ambulance ride that transported the patient
